description: Refers to 「Ant Huabei」. A consumer credit service provided by Ant Financial, an affiliate of Alibaba. Allows payment by credit when using Alipay. Offers up to 41 days interest-free and installment options. According to the 「2017 Young People Consumption Trend Data Report」, over 76% of young people with a monthly income of over 4000 yuan hold a credit card. Meanwhile, the 「2017 Young People Consumption Life Report」 by Ant Huabei states that over half of young people born in the 90s use Ant Huabei.

examples.chinese: 短信提醒我本月花呗已还多少未还多少
examples.translation: Received a text reminding me how much Huabei I've repaid and how much is left this month

examples.chinese: 花呗和信用卡要无力偿还了
examples.translation: Can't afford to repay Huabei and credit cards anymore

examples.chinese: 透支消费捆绑了现代年轻人,以前是月光族,现在是花呗族
examples.translation: Overdraft consumption has bound modern young people; used to be the Moonlight Clan, now the Huabei Clan
